title: Duration
goal: Learn duration markers for short, medium, and long time.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Combined tense review:

was eating → ?
will begin working → ?
had finished → ?

(Answers: puca'o citka, baco'a gunka, pumo'u)

New Material (5-7 min)

Duration Markers

Cmavo Duration Example
ze'i short mi ze'i sipna (I sleep briefly)
ze'a medium mi ze'a gunka (I work for a while)
ze'u long mi ze'u xabju ti (I live here long-term)

Using Duration

mi ze'i cadzu

I walk briefly.

mi ze'a tcidu

I read for a while.

mi ze'u tadni la .jbobau.

I study Lojban for a long time.

Duration with Tense

Combine duration with tense for more precision:

mi pu ze'a gunka

I worked for a while (in the past).

mi ba ze'u xabju ti

I will live here for a long time.

Duration with Contour

mi ze'i ca'o sipna

I am briefly sleeping.

mi ze'u co'a tadni

I begin a long study session.

Key Point

ze'i (short), ze'a (medium), ze'u (long) specify how long an action takes.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Add Duration

Add appropriate duration:

  1. I sleep briefly. → ?
  2. I work for a while. → ?
  3. I live here long-term. → ?
Answers
  1. mi ze'i sipna
  2. mi ze'a gunka
  3. mi ze'u xabju ti

Exercise 2: Translate

Translate:

  1. I walked briefly.
  2. I will study for a while.
  3. I have lived here for a long time.
Answers
  1. mi pu ze'i cadzu
  2. mi ba ze'a tadni
  3. mi pu ze'u xabju ti

Exercise 3: Daily Activities

Describe durations:

  1. I eat briefly. → ?
  2. I work for a while. → ?
  3. I sleep for a long time. → ?
Answers
  1. mi ze'i citka
  2. mi ze'a gunka
  3. mi ze'u sipna

items.text: I will study for a while.
I have lived here for a long time.
I sleep for a long time. → ?

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I work for a while." → mi ze'a gunka
  2. "I sleep long." → mi ze'u sipna
  3. "I walked briefly." → mi pu ze'i cadzu

Summary

You learned duration markers: ze'i (short), ze'a (medium), ze'u (long). These specify how long an action takes.
